message_catalog.msg: Add New Tasks From a Translation Memory Analysis
Add a \"manual\" task to the project.
Add a new file to the list of tasks.

Add the content of a local Trados 'wordcount.csv' file to the list of tasks. \nThe file needs to be called 'wordcount.csv' (lowercase letters), it needs to reside in the project folder, and there may not be more then one file with this name.
An optional field specifying the project reference code of the client. Is used when printing the invoice. Example: 20030310A12478
Can't find the project with group id of %project_id%
Can't find the project with ID '%project_id%'
(\"Classical\" Trados import of a local 'wordcount.csv' file)
Click right and choose \"Save target as\" to download the file
Create folder structure and create a subproject for each language that you have chosen.
Did you enter the same task name twice?
Error deleting the temporary wordcount file %trados_wordcount_file%
New files need to be located in the \"source_xx\" folder to appear in the drop-down box on the left.
Please check the file permissions or contact your system administrator.
Please check your input or ask the project manager.
Please choose only a single role for assignment
Please determine the valid file and delete or rename the other ones.
Please edit your project and add a source language.
Please start Trados and generate a file for this folder.
Please try to repeat your Trados analysis or inform the system administrator.
Please upload a file with the extension \".CSV\".

Shows the status of all tasks
Ass: Assigned Files
Dn: Downloaded Files
Up: Uploaded Files

The most probable cause for this error is that the Project Manager has not uploaded the file yet.
Please contact the project manager of your project:
The project has no target language defined, so we are unable to add translation tasks to the project.
The project_id specified doesn't look like an integer.
The specified file does not exist.
The specified file %file% is not available.
The task_id specified doesn't look like an integer.
This file is used to define the tasks of the project, one task for each line of the wordcount file.
(This page may take several minutes to upload your file, depending on the size of the file and your Internet connection. Please do not interrupt the system meanwhile.)
This task is not going to controled by the translation workflow.
Translation target languages. Searate target folders will be created for every language that you select
Use the 'Browse...' button to locate your file, then click 'Open'.
Use the Browse... button to locate your file, and click \"Add ...\" to upload a Trados wordcount (.CSV) file to.
We have found more then one 'wordcount.csv' files in the project path '%project_path%'.
We have not found a 'wordcount.csv' file in the project path '%project_path%'.
Who is the final consumer (when working for an agency)? Examples: \"Shell\", \"UBS\", ...
You are not allowed to upload the file (anymore) while the task has status '%task_status%'.
You are not allowed to see the file
You have insufficient privileges to see this page
You have insufficient access rights to download this file.
You have insufficient permissions to view this page
You have insufficient privileges to view this page.
You have no rights to modify this object.
You have no rights to see this object.
You haven't defined the source language of your project.
You haven't selected a user for auto assignment.
Your are trying to download the file "%file_name%" in the folder "%download_folder%", but the file is not readable or does not exist in the system.
Your file doesn't coincide with the expected file:
Your file is larger than the maximum permissible upload size
Your file is larger than the maximum permissible upload size: %util_commify_number_max_n_bytes% bytes
Your file is not a trados wordcount file.
Your file '%trados_wordcount_file%' has not been created with one of the supported Trados versions (3.x, 5.0, 5.5, 6.0 and 6.5).
You have successfully uploaded %filesize% bytes of file '%task_name%'.
No translator comments in this project
A new file has been uploaded: Folder: %upload_folder% Task Name: %task_name% Project: %project_name%
Please try to repeat your Freebudget analysis or inform the system administrator.
Your file '%freebudget_wordcount_file%' has not been created with one of the supported Freebudget versions (4.0, 5.0).
Your file '%webbudget_wordcount_file%' has not been created with one of the supported Webbudget versions (3.9).
